  • Uses of PerceptionEgo in org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation

    Classes in org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation that implement PerceptionEgo
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    VehicleUnit.PerceptionEgoVehicleAdapter
    Adapter for Vehicle Units to provide access to necessary data and functions for the SimplePerceptionModule.

    We don't let VehicleUnit implement the PerceptionEgo interface directly to avoid exposing methods which are relevant for perception only.
